cells.data:
• Final exam
    • Thursday on week 8, 8/17, meet at 8a, same room
    • Single side of paper, 8x11.5, handwritten, whatever notes
    • All inclusive (pre/post midterm)
  • Graphics review
    • (x,y): 0,0 at top left
    • Left to right; Top to bottom
    • General process
      • Create an object by calling a class
      • Use the objectâ€™s method to draw

Class: Calculator
  1. Take string from user
  2. Replace spaces with nonspaces
  3. Locate the operator at position n
  4. Create three variables
    1. 0 - (n-1) = First number
    2. n = Operator (handle if operator is two characters long)
    3. (n+1) - len(str) = Second number
  5. Use the three variables to perform the math
    1. if variable 1 or 3 contains a period, make it float, otherwise integer
    2. use the second variable as an operator
